name: Nipun Pitimanaaree
description:
Co-Founder and Core Contributor of INFINIT -- the first DeFi abstraction layer that lets you launch and scale DeFi protocols in minutes. INIT Capital, a liquidity hook money market, was launched based on INFINIT abstraction layer as a PoC and GTM. Previously, co-founded Alpha Finance and was the first to introduce leveraged yield farming through Alpha Homora product. 

I graduated from MIT, and received 4 gold medals and 1 silver medal from International Mathematical Olympiad.
